name: How Not To Summon A Reaper
name_original: How Not To Summon A Reaper
description:
Some dumb reaper broke his scythe when he missed your face. You decide to team up to gain more power back, by getting killed by different types of enemies to gain powers.  Will you let the shifty reaper corrupt you in the end?

Gameplay walkthrough spoilers: 

Get killed by every type of slime to unlock new abilities. The green and red can stack once. Get killed by every Stealth Slime on the map to unlock the boss door. 

There are 2 different endings depending on what you do in the final battle.

Credits:

Made by me, some sound assets taken from the wowie asset pack

https://jonas-tyroller.itch.io/wowie-pack

Music:

https://dova-s.jp/bgm/play12401.html

https://dova-s.jp/bgm/play10407.htm

Post Jam Bug Fixes: 

  • Fixed a bug where you could skip fighting the final boss by leaving and reentering after he kills you.
  • Modified the bad ending text to make it clearer that there is a different ending.
